Empty Empty No Result Cancel Save OK Turn Off Time zone Ringtone Vibration Snooze No Ringtone No Vibration Not set Time zone Label slow fast %1$d hour %2$d minutes %1$d hours %2$d minutes %1$d hour %1$d hours %1$d minute %1$d minutes %1$d day %1$d days %1$d year %1$d years Weekend Weekdays Tomorrow Today Everyday Everyday within period AM PM Undo Alarm Snooze Dismiss Alarm Unmute Missed Alarm Missed Last Alarm Select Color Not selected Clear New Alarm New Alarm Modify Alarm Alarm will be fired at %1$s in local time. Start/Reservation Date End Date Not set %1$s (%2$s) ~ %3$s (%4$s) Until %1$s From %1$s %1$s (%2$s) Last alarm %1$s - Last alarm My ringtone System ringtone Add new Create Remove Time conversion Date Revert to default Apply Reset %1$s (%2$s) Change log Change Revoke More Retry
Alarm has been removed. Time zone (%1$s) has been removed. less than a minute Same as device time zone Same as set time zone Alarm will be fired after %1$s from now. Alarm will be fired every %1$s at %2$s. Alarm will be fired everyday at %1$s. Alarm has been dismissed. Alarm volume is muted. Selected time zone is already added in the list. Start date has been removed. Start date should not be earlier than now. End date has been removed. End date should be later than now. End date should be later than start date. Repeats should be checked at least one. Please check start date and end date. Could not create an alarm. Please check setting. Alarm (%1$s) won\'t be fired anymore. Error occurred. Invalid call. If you keep seeing this error, please re-create alarm. Sorry for inconvenience. Selected ringtone is already added in the list. Unable to create alarm. Please try again later. Confirm before change Due to summer time support, time and repeat of %1$d alarm(s) will be changed. The scheduled date and time won\'t change immediately, but will take effect from next. Click here to see the affected alarms. Due to summer time support, Alarm schedule method has been changed. The scheduled date and time won\'t be changed immediately, but will take effect from next. For more information, please click Visit Wiki in settings. Apply Changes Change Notice Before change\n%1$s\n\nAfter change\n%2$s\n\nTo apply immediately, click Apply Changes in notification. Please open app to review Google EU User Consent Policy. The change wil be applied next app launch. Alarm scheduling failed An error occurred while scheduling alarm.
Select time zone Region Time zone Region Time zone %1$s (%2$s) Search region Unknown time zone Click to select time zone Add Please select time zone Wrong time zone Changes from %1$s to %2$s. Changing the time zone affects the following items.\n- Time\n- Date (includes start/end date)\n- Repeat days (Activate in the setting tab) %1$s is in Summer Time. It ends on %2$s. %1$s uses Summer Time, but not in it now. It starts on %2$s. %1$s doesn\'t use Daylight Saving Time. %1$s uses Summer Time, but could not resolve information. Please try again later.
GENERAL General TIME_ZONE_SELECTOR_KEY Select time zone by CONVERTER_GOTO Change date and time ENABLE_24_HOUR_CLOCK Enable 24 hour clock
ALARM Alarm ALARM_MUTE_KEY Silence after ALARM_VOLUME_KEY Alarm Volume ALARM_INCREASE_KEY Gradually increase volume TIME_ZONE_CHANGE Notify when time zone changes TIME_ZONE_AFFECT_REPETITION Apply time difference to repeat day(s) All activated alarms will be rescheduled and repeat days can be changed.
CONVERTER Time Conversion CONVERTER_TIME_ZONE Default time zone CONVERTER_TIME_ZONE_ID REMEMBER Remember last settings
Others Others HELP Visit Wiki VERSION Version LICENSE Open Source License PRIVACY Privacy Policy GITHUB EEA Change or revoke Google EU User Consent Policy Change or Revoke EU user can change or revoke consent of ads that uses privacy (like AdID) by Google EU User Consent Policy. Change will be applied next app launch. The app will be finished if revoked and can use again if re-consent. This app is maintained by advertising revenue. ` Visit GitHub
